timeline.body: Is this a bug fix? Does the release notify you when idle when you get hit?
timeline.bodyText: Is this a bug fix? Does the release notify you when idle when you get hit?
timeline.bodyHTML: Is this a bug fix? Does the release notify you when idle when you get hit?
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: I wasn't sure if it was an oversight or intentional but yes, in release you get a damage notification when idle even when set to "On Action Interrupted".
replies.author: Hannah-GBS

replies.bodyText: I see you added this part as an independent commit. If the rest of the PR is seen as unnecessary I'm happy to move it to the plugin hub
replies.author: Hannah-GBS

replies.bodyText: Generally I just like to fix bugs independent of adding new features
replies.author: Adam-

timeline.body: The 3 config classes are copies of each other but just with different names
timeline.bodyText: The 3 config classes are copies of each other but just with different names
timeline.bodyHTML: The 3 config classes are copies of each other but just with different names
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: You're right, I misunderstood how this worked. Removed the redundant classes.
replies.author: Hannah-GBS

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.body:
This all simplifies to:
```
WintertodtNotifyDamage notify = config.notifyCold();
shouldNotify = notify == ALWAYS || (notify == INTERRUPT && wasInterrupted)
```

And can maybe be combined with the snowfall/brazier stuff below too.
timeline.bodyText:
This all simplifies to:
WintertodtNotifyDamage notify = config.notifyCold();
shouldNotify = notify == ALWAYS || (notify == INTERRUPT && wasInterrupted)

And can maybe be combined with the snowfall/brazier stuff below too.
timeline.bodyHTML:
This all simplifies to:

WintertodtNotifyDamage notify = config.notifyCold();
shouldNotify = notify == ALWAYS || (notify == INTERRUPT && wasInterrupted)

And can maybe be combined with the snowfall/brazier stuff below too.
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: I (and others in #dev) couldn't think of a good way to combine the 3 cases, but I made this change and otherwise if this looks good to you I'll squash these commits
replies.author: Hannah-GBS
